page.title: 04Fryerning.
page.content:
Fryerning lies approximately one mile north of Ingatestone. It is a scattered parish including the areas of Beggar Hill and Mill Green and contains about one hundred houses. There are no shops of any description in the area - only a couple of post boxes, a church (just outside the block) and three pubs - The Huntsman (just inside the block) and The Cricketers and The Viper (just outside).
The majority of houses in Fryerning are arranged in a triangle along Mill Green Road and Back Lane with a short connecting road acting as the base of the triangle. All the houses have large gardens and are surrounded by fields, meadows and woodland. There are no factories or industrial buildings in Fryerning.
